Shields of the Eladrin Host.name: Shields of the Eladrin Host
Shields of the Eladrin Host.flavor: Spectral eladrin knights spring from all sides, protecting you and your allies from danger, transporting all of you to safety, and then disappear back into the Feywild.
Shields of the Eladrin Host.trigger: An attack hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you
Shields of the Eladrin Host.target: You and each ally in the burst
Shields of the Eladrin Host.effect: Each target gains a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of his or her next turn. After the triggering attack is resolved, any target can swap positions with another target.
